thread.section_title: NOW FINANCE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of NOW FINANCE | www.nowfinance.com.au
thread.title: Robyn L Baggow
thread.title_full: NOW FINANCE reviewed by Robyn L Baggow

author: Robyn L Baggow
title: Robyn L Baggow
text: NOW FINANCE and Christina was very helpful, supportive of my application through NOW FINANCE. I submitted paperwork required and checks were done and taking a week finance was approved. Christina was very professional, helpful, polite and dedicated to assisting me at the time throughout my application process. Very appreciative of the final approval of my loan. Thank you NOW FINANCE and Christina.
